title._content: [Unidentified soldier in infantry uniform sitting between two women, probably relatives] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in infantry uniform sitting between two women, probably relatives] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype ; 8.0 x 9.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather; scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Purchased from: Bryan Watson, Civil War Images, Torrington, Wyoming, 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Soldiers--1860-1870. Military uniforms--1860-1870. Women--1860-1870. Families--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel. Format: Group portraits--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
